channel.title: A few problems :S
channel.description:
Right, so basically, i have added 4 more whip recolours into the client. I have changed their stats, so they give bonuses in different areas etc (item.cfg)
Now, all that is wrong is that when i go to my 'Owner Whip' ig, and attack with it, is that it attacks like a longsword, even thought it looks exactly like a recoloured whip. Also, when i go onto the weapon tab, it has the "slash" "stab" etc... like this : [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/12/attackx.jpg/][IMG]http://img12.imageshack.us/img12/1185/attackx.jpg[/img][/URL]
You see? It all seems to be wrong, and my question (1) is, how do i change that to the normal whip... interface? Thanks.
And, question 2...hehe :)
I'm thinking about recolouring a godsword, (i know recolours look gay and stupid, and mess everything up etc etc, but it's all experience, and i just want to get my head around iit..)
I have the ints, for an arma godsword, and i understand that Array156, and Array160 are recolours and everything to do with that...
I just want to know how i could recolour it, say... red, and black or purple and black, and then give it a different id, so i can keep the original, and the new one?
Thankyou again :)
EDIT, I have made the godsword, a different id, and spawned it IG, but, as expected, it isn't held like the godswords, and doesn't remove my shield. I'm wondering how and were i edit that, for it. Just incase you're wondering, i've changed the id, to a bronze 2h... which(for me) is id; 1307.

item.title: A few problems :S
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

Right, so basically, i have added 4 more whip recolours into the client.
I have changed their stats, so they give bonuses in different areas etc (item.cfg)

Now, all that is wrong is that when i go to my ‘Owner Whip’ ig, and attack with it, is that it attacks like a longsword, even thought it looks exactly like a recoloured whip.
Also, when i go onto the weapon tab, it has the “slash” “stab” etc… like this :

You see? It all seems to be wrong, and my question (1) is, how do i change that to the normal whip… interface?
Thanks.

And, question 2…hehe

I’m thinking about recolouring a godsword, (i know recolours look gay and stupid, and mess everything up etc etc, but it’s all experience, and i just want to get my head around iit…)

I have the ints, for an arma godsword, and i understand that Array156, and Array160 are recolours and everything to do with that…

I just want to know how i could recolour it, say… red, and black or purple and black, and then give it a different id, so i can keep the original, and the new one?

Thankyou again

EDIT,
I have made the godsword, a different id, and spawned it IG, but, as expected, it isn’t held like the godswords, and doesn’t remove my shield.
I’m wondering how and were i edit that, for it.
Just incase you’re wondering, i’ve changed the id, to a bronze 2h… which(for me) is id; 1307.

Read full topic
